page.title: 05Cann House
page.content: The original Cann House was built in 1863; since then there has been a fire and various alterations. In 1960, Group Captain Cheshire V.C. bought the house on behalf of the Cheshire foundation. Since then it has been a Cheshire home for disabled residents. Prior to this it was owned by a family named Tucker who were business financers and property developers. When their three children grew up and married they put Cann House up for sale. In the grounds there are many different sorts of trees, said to come from all over the world. They are all different colours and the lawns and plants are very beautiful to look at. Nicholas Greaves
